config.revengeance.rageUpdateInterval.co: How often (in ticks) to scan for hostile entities for rage charging. Lower = more accurate but worse performance. (1-20)
config.revengeance.rageCacheDuration.com: How long (in ticks) to cache hostile entity scan results. Should be >= rageUpdateInterval for best performance.
config.revengeance.rageDetectionRadius.c: Maximum distance to detect hostile entities for rage charging (8-64 blocks)
config.revengeance.rageInnerRadius.comme: Distance for maximum rage charging speed (4-32 blocks, should be < rageDetectionRadius)
